biotools.summary:
BioStructures.jl is a Julia package to read, write and manipulate macromolecular structures (particularly proteins)

BioStructures provides functionality to read, write and manipulate macromolecular structures, in particular proteins. Protein Data Bank (PDB), mmCIF and MMTF format files can be read in to a hierarchical data structure. Spatial calculations and functions to access the PDB are also provided. It compares favourably in terms of performance to other PDB parsers.
